txt.en:
'You have been a help to we who keep Gabilshathûr safe, [placeholder], and I am sure you can do the same for others. Some time ago, a company of Rangers and Hillmen led by a man named Golodir crossed Rammas Deluon. Many could not overcome the power of the watching-stones, but some few escaped the dreadful statues.

'The survivors established a camp, Gath Forthnír, far to the north, in Himbar. Go to them and give them the assistance you have provided us!

'You are strong and brave, [placeholder], [placeholder] of much skill. You will bring hope to those who stand watch against the evils of Carn Dûm.'
'You have come from Gabilshathûr? Welcome, friend. Your aid is indeed welcome here.'
Commander Gisur is impressed with your performance and believes he knows of someone who can use your aid.
Talk to the gate-keeper of Gath Forthnír
Gath Forthnír is far to the north of Gabilshathûr.\n\nCommander Gisur told you that Golodir's army was not completely destroyed, and the Ranger has established a camp in the north, Gath Forthnír.
